name: IAM Service
description: Service for identifying, authorizing, granting access and issuing and renewing JWTs.
capabilities: The user can log in by providing a username and password, in response he will receive a JWT.
The user can provide an expiring JWT and receive a new JWT by renewing it.

qualities: Deployment model as a Kubernetes service
logic: Check if the user is registered in the repository
Checks the validity of the JWT
Releases a new JWT to replace the expired one

serviceDependencies: Without JWT or Auth Header / Query parameter
